恓字的基本解释

恓
xī
〔恓恓〕忙碌不安，如“圣人恓恓忧世。”
〔恓惶〕a.烦恼，如“不信好人言，果有恓恓事”；ｂ．匆忙劳碌，如“恓恓戎旅下，蹉跎淮海滨”。

恓
qī
古同“凄”，悲伤难过。

恓
xù
古同“恤”。

恓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qī］
同“悽1”。
(1)悲痛；悲伤。参见“恓楚”、“恓愴”。
(2)寒冷。

恓字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　恓； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页384第14
【張訢訂正篇海】先齊切，音西。恓惶，煩惱之貌。【韋應物?盧陟詩】恓惶戎旅下。　與栖通。

恓字的源字形

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
恓字的起名意思

暂无。

troubled
Basic explanation of words
troubled
xī
[恓恓] Busy and uneasy, such as "The saint is worried about the world."
〔Tangling〕 a. Worries, such as "If you don't believe in good words, you will feel embarrassed"; b. Toil in a hurry, such as "Xun Xuan Rong Jie, wasting Huaihai Beach."
troubled
qī
Gu Tong is "sorrowful", sad and sad.
troubled
xù
Gu Tong's "shirt".
troubled
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qī］
Same as "Qing 1".
(1) Grief; sadness. See "Yun Chu", "Yun Chang".
(2) Cold.
troubled
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　恓; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 384 14
[Zhang Xin Revised Chapter Sea] First Qiqie, Yinxi. Panic, troubled appearance. [Wei Yingwu? Poems of Lu Zhi] Travelling under the panic.　With Qitong.
